title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition Outdoor Watch, the ultimate companion for surfers and outdoor enthusiasts. With solar charging capabilities, you can enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode and up to 48 hours in GPS mode with continuous solar charging. 

Stay on top of your surfing game with features like wave counting, maximum speed tracking, distance tracking, and tide data. The windsurfing and kiteboarding features include GPS position tracking, speed measurement, distance measurement, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps. 

This watch is compatible with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ for customization. It comes preloaded with activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training. With a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and support for GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems, you'll never get lost on your adventures. 

Monitor your health with features like heart rate tracking, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox sensor, and stress tracking. With a water rating of 100 meters, thermal and shock resistance, and a case made of fiber-reinforced polymer and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass, this watch can withstand any adventure. Don't miss out on the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition Outdoor Watch, your perfect companion for the great outdoors.

Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch! This sleek and stylish watch not only looks great on your wrist, but it also packs a punch with its amazing features.

With solar charging capabilities, you can say goodbye to constantly worrying about battery life. The smartwatch mode offers unlimited battery life with just 3 hours of sunlight exposure per day, and the GPS mode can last up to 48 hours with continuous solar charging. 

Perfect for surfers, this watch comes equipped with wave counting, maximum speed tracking, distance tracking, and tide data features. For windsurfing and kiteboarding enthusiasts, you'll love the GPS position tracking, speed measurement, distance measurement, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps.

Stay connected with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ compatibility. Plus, with preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, you'll always be ready for your next adventure.

Navigate like a pro with the 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and support for GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems. Keep track of your health with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox monitoring, respiration tracking, and stress tracking.

Built to last, this watch is water-rated to 100 meters, thermal and shock-resistant, and made with a fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass. Don't miss out on this must-have accessory in a stylish 45mm size.

Get your Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch today and take your outdoor adventures to the next level!
